{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer_C3200.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC3200 Wireless Tri-Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C3200.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C3200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC32003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C3200 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709A0; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/31/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00YY3XSSA |asin_country = US |asin2 = B010Q11OGG |asin_country2 = DE |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 3 |rad3rxchains = 3 |rad3sstreams = 3 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam3 = 600 |rad3n = 450 |rad3g = 54 |rad3b = 11 |rad3freq = 2.4 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "14112723200-1.0 Rev:1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Proware|TP-LINK}} <!--"141" - [[Arcadyan]] WG1272AC3200 (??)-->
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.guru3d.com/news-story/tp-link-archer-c2600-and-c3200-wi-fi-routers.html On '''Guru3d'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/tp-link-wireless-router-mu-mimo-ac,28350.html On '''TomsHardWare'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2015/32593-tp-link-debuts-ac-router-duo ''TP-LINK Debuts AC Router Duo - CES 2015'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''''] :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 FCC] ::2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]]'s XStream :*[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x|TP-LINK Archer C2600]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 FCC] ::1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[Qualcomm]] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4600Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 Qualcomm MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports :*[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 FCC] ::2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 FCC] ::2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK SR20]] - ''AC1900 Smart Home Router with Touchscreen'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), ZigBee and Z-Wave ::@1GHz dual-core CPU, USB 2.0/3.0 ports, SD Card slot, 4.3" display
==See also== *[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]]
